tree.name: Max Strus
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team sign-and-trade: Cavaliers acquired Max Strus from Heat, sent Cedi Osman and Lamar Stevens to Spurs, 2nd round picks to Miami and San Antonio
tree.note: Guard from DePaul, signed 4-year, $63 million deal

assetsGivenUp.name: Lamar Stevens
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward signed as undrafted free agent from Penn State

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 CLE 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Cavaliers' own second-round pick to Miami

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 CLE 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Cavaliers' own second-round pick to San Antonio

tradeChain.name: Max Strus
tradeChain.note: Guard from DePaul, signed training camp contract with Miami Heat after being waived by Celtics and Bulls
